name: Tetraquest
description:
A hero finds himself stuck in a world where bricks from the sky
  • Press AD to run around
  • Space to Jump over them pesky blocks
  • Exclamation bricks become monsters
  • Earn points by knocking them out your enemies with your gun.
  • Beware of getting crushed by the falling bricks!
  • How do I open those treasure blocks...
A weird character has entered your tetroblock* game
  • Use the Left Right arrow keys to move the piece
  • Use UP to rotate it
  • The exclamation blocks make zombies and don't stay on the board
  • Crush them pesky zombies, but watch out for the hero!
  • It's tetroblock*! Clear lines and earn points.
  • Treasure blocks seem to reward more points!

Credits

Game made in Godot

Music is 8bitchill from Antti Luode

SFX made with sfxr

All art was made on Aseprite

This game was made for GMTK 2021 with the theme "Joined Together" . 

Keep your hero alive, but don't lose the game! And share your high score! Mine's 1000 points solo. Thanks for playing! Never stop dreaming :)
